summary.raw:
TransparentViewWidget part of public API on macOS

Needs to be part of public API because GLWidget inherits from it on
macOS.
summary.html:
TransparentViewWidget part of public API on macOS

Needs to be part of public API because GLWidget inherits from it on
macOS.

values.message:
TransparentViewWidget part of public API on macOS

Needs to be part of public API because GLWidget inherits from it on
macOS.

summary.raw:
Fix GUI plugins on macOS

GUI plugins never worked on macOS because the OpenGL layer was always
drawn on top of the window. With this commit, the OpenGL layer is now
drawn below the window, and instead the GLWidget's area is "carved out"
making the underlying OpenGL layer visible. Any GUI plugin then
obviously also is on top of the OpenGL layer.

See also:
https://developer.apple.com/library/content/documentation/GraphicsImaging/Conceptual/OpenGL-MacProgGuide/opengl_contexts/opengl_contexts.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40001987-CH216-SW21
(In short, the fix is the Apple-recommended way of drawing UI elements
on top of OpenGL.)

Only caveat: This fix requires an upstream change in OGRE. This version
works: https://github.com/fschopp/ogre/releases/tag/v1.10.7-fschopp-1

GUI plugins never worked on macOS because the OpenGL layer was always

See also:

summary.raw:
Fix issues with OGRE 1.10.7

Changes:
- Recent versions of OGRE don't have a different prefix for
  OGRE plugin libraries on macOS than on other systems.
- OGRE doesn not like redundant resources
- Must not pass null "externalWindowHandle" to OGRE's
  createRenderWindow(). Also fixed missing initialization of
  RenderEngine::dummyWindowId.
- Missing headers during debug builds.
- Changes with HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr et al. (no longer a
  subclass of SharedPtr). Changes should still work with older versions
  of OGRE.
summary.html:
Fix issues with OGRE 1.10.7

Changes:
- Recent versions of OGRE don't have a different prefix for
OGRE plugin libraries on macOS than on other systems.
- OGRE doesn not like redundant resources
- Must not pass null "externalWindowHandle" to OGRE's
createRenderWindow(). Also fixed missing initialization of
RenderEngine::dummyWindowId.
- Missing headers during debug builds.
- Changes with HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr et al. (no longer a
subclass of SharedPtr). Changes should still work with older versions
of OGRE.

values.message:
Fix issues with OGRE 1.10.7

Changes:
- Recent versions of OGRE don't have a different prefix for
  OGRE plugin libraries on macOS than on other systems.
- OGRE doesn not like redundant resources
- Must not pass null "externalWindowHandle" to OGRE's
  createRenderWindow(). Also fixed missing initialization of
  RenderEngine::dummyWindowId.
- Missing headers during debug builds.
- Changes with HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr et al. (no longer a
  subclass of SharedPtr). Changes should still work with older versions
  of OGRE.
